law.text: Any person subject to this code who through neglect or design misses the movement of a ship, aircraft, or unit with which the person is required in the course of duty to move shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 91, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 62.
